name: Gravity Hatchet
description:
Aim your throw and try to hit the target on the other side of the planet, using only your mouse!  Right-click and drag around to view the obstacles that may be in your way, left-click to make your toss!

This is a short 3-level demo I created as a part of a learning program for Unity.  Hopefully this may develop into a full game or evolve into a different prototype in the future.
